title: Australia's Santos sells Pyrenees crude at steady premium - sources
text:
Australia's Santos sells Pyrenees crude at steady premium - sources

Commodities 4 hours ago (Sep 19, 2019 15:20)

© Reuters. Australia's Santos sells Pyrenees crude at steady premium - sources SINGAPORE, Sept 19 (Reuters) - * Australian oil and gas producer Santos Ltd has sold a cargo of Pyrenees at a premium of about $13 a barrel to dated via a spot tender, two trade sources said on Thursday * The 550,000-barrel cargo was offered to load over Nov. 8-12 * Pyrenees is one of Australia's heavy sweet crudes that have been sold at record premiums over the past several months, supported by strong demand from traders who are buying the grades for blending into marine fuels that meet new low-sulphur ship fuel rules starting in January 2020

Australia's Santos sells Pyrenees crude at steady premium - sources
description: Australia's Santos sells Pyrenees crude at steady premium - sources
